edge: Chhalaang is a upcoming Bollywood movie directed by Hansal Mehta. The official announcement of the film was made on August 10, 2018, with Rajkummar Rao and Nushrat Bharucha in lead roles.
Hansal Mehta is an Indian film director, screenwriter and producer known for his works in Hindi cinema. He announced the movie 'Chhalaang' on August 10, 2018.
Rajkummar Rao is an Indian film actor who predominantly works in Hindi cinema. He is playing the lead role in Hansal Mehta's 'Chhalaang', announced on August 10, 2018.
Nushrat Bharucha is an Indian film actress who predominantly works in Hindi cinema. She is one of the leads in Hansal Mehta's 'Chhalaang', announced on August 10, 2018.
Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub is an Indian actor who appears in Hindi cinema. He joined the cast of 'Chhalaang' to play a supporting role in late-2018.
Principal photography for Hansal Mehta's 'Chhalaang' began in late-2018.
Rao and Mehta, along with Ayyub, were spotted filming a kabaddi scene in Mumbai's Film City in June 2019.
In December 2019, the title of the film 'Turram Khan' was changed to 'Chhalaang', which means 'Jump'.
